column4: Why doesn't Ubuntu support the screencast feature baked into Gnome 3?
Because it doesn't support GNOME3 yet.
Nope, based on GNOME2. GNOME3 will be supported with 11.10

Well GNOME will stop shipping with 11.10. 11.10 will only ship with Unity from then onwards, but GNOME3 will be available in the repositories. Unity is based on either GNOME2 or 3 actually, I only know it's based on GNOME.
